name: Fox bro
text: By the way, did you take your [b]pollen allergy medicine?[/b]

name: Fox bro
text: You ran out of it?! God, why do I have to go through this...

name: Fox bro
text: Okay. Lucky for us, I predicted that would happen and dug a bunch of [b]holes[/b].

name: Fox bro
text: You can [b]travel through them with ENTER[/b] to avoid those flowers.

name: Fox bro
text: Just be mindful and donâ€™t expect sheep to follow you. They are too fluffy for that.
